text.name: system_description
text.text: Final Burn Alpha is an arcade game emulator based on the Final Burn emulator, which emulates various systems such as the MVS, CPS1 and CPS2, System 16, System 18, X and Y Board from Sega, as well as a whole list of Cave Toaplan, Taito, Psikyo, Kaneko, ... It runs on Windows but is also ported to Linux, OSX and Android.
